summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 7, Block 68, Terry's 1st Addition; Lot 16 and the south one-half of Lot 15, Block 6, Davis Addition; and Lots 18 to 23 inclusive, Block 5, J. R. McLaughlin's Water Front Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-206 and 17-153, respectively.
